page.title: 20CLUNBURY WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content:
The institute draws its membership from four villages including Clunton and the surrounding area. There are meetings in Kempton and Clunton twice a year each. The rest are held in Clunbury. The meeting are held once amonth with a speaker and social get together combined. Two competitions are held each month including a Flower of the Month competition.
This project is the result of a joint effort by members of Clunbury Womens Institute. Part of the work is from our own Domesday Book made in 1980. Anybody who comes to read this work may well like to read the whole of this book which is kept in Clunbury Church.
